message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a competitive price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for offering, Alice!  That price is a bit high for me. Would you consider $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $135, but I think you'll really appreciate the value this product offers. It's a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  I'm getting closer to what I can afford. How about $110?
I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $130?
Alice, thanks for working with me.  I can do $115, and that's really pushing my budget.  What do you say?
I can see you're really trying to make this work, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $125?
